attributes.action: Require presenters of television phone-in competitions to declare who benefits and by how much.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many television shows promote phone-in 
competitions whereby a very simple 
question is put as an inducement to 
call a premium rate number. The viewers 
should be informed how much income is 
expected and whether the production 
company and/or the presenters benefit 
from this. If we buy raffle tickets or 
gamble on the national lottery we are 
informed who receives any income. Such 
needs to be the case generally.
